patthana16.87:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.87:1.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana16.87:1.1_2: anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupekkhāsahagato ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.87:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
